mapper.select: SELECT B.USER_ID AS CLOSER_ID , B.USER_NAME AS CLOSER_NAME , A.MODIFY_DATE FROM TOPENCLOSE A , TUSER B WHERE A.MODIFY_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY A.MODIFY_DATE DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT OC.OPEN_CLOSE_SEQ FROM TOPENCLOSE OC WHERE CLOSE_MONEY IS NOT NULL AND date_format(OC.INSERT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') = curdate();
SELECT OPEN_CLOSE_NO FROM TOPENCLOSE ORDER BY OPEN_CLOSE_NO DESC LIMIT 1;
